_GEng_Start.documentation: Starts G-Engin, and creates a display window
_GEng_Start.label: _GEng_Start($sTitle, $iW, $iH, $iX = -1, $iY = -1, $iStyle = -1, $iExtStyle = -1)

params.label: $sTitle
params.documentation: The title of the dialog box

params.label: $iX
params.documentation:
The left side of the dialog box. By default (-1), the window is centered.
If defined, top must also be defined.

params.label: $iY
params.documentation: The top of the dialog box. Default (-1) is centered.

params.label: $iStyle
params.documentation:
Defines the style of the window.
(See GUI Control Styles Appendix (AutoIt3 Doc)).

params.label: $iExtStyle
params.documentation:
Defines the extended style of the window.
(See the Extended Style Table in GuiCreate Doc)

_GEng_Shutdown.documentation: Stops G-Engin, deletes the display window, and free all the resources
_GEng_Shutdown.label: _GEng_Shutdown()

_GEng_SetDebug.documentation: Change debug mode, or get it's current status
_GEng_SetDebug.label: _GEng_SetDebug($mode = Default)

params.label: $mode
params.documentation:
One of the following:
	- *Default* Get the status of debug mode
	- *0* : Deactivate debug mode

	Combination of:
	- *$GEng_Debug_Pens* Only Creates the colors needed to manualy draw with the _GEng_Debug_xxx Functions (parameter $iDbgPen)
	- *$GEng_Debug_Sprites* Draws the sprites boxes
	- *$GEng_Debug_Vectors* Draw the vectors (Speed and Acceleration)
	- *$GEng_Debug_Collisions* Draw the collisions
